name: Phantom Fishers
description:
Time to go fishing, but not with a normal rod, but a ghost rod!

Make the lure transparent to go through obstructions. 

Catch fish with the lure, and drag them to the surface.

If the lure hits anything, the fish will let go.

If the lure's intangibility is turned on, the fish will let go.

CONTROLS

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

Space (Hold) - Intangibility

NOTES

Important notes regarding the game:

  • Game made for Windows systems (developed in Windows 10).
  • The game does not have any audio, thus no volume controls are present.
  • Use the options button on the main menu to change the screen size.
  • There's a glitch where if you have the maximum amount of fish on the line (which is 5), and try to collect another fish, the uncollected fish will become solid for collisions with the player's hook. This fish cannot be hooked once this happens. There are are up to 50 fishes present at a given time, so the game should still be very-much playable, but be careful of this bug.
